strategy: Apply a neural network with dense layers and embedded categorical features (e.g., using one-hot encoding with dimensionality reduction via PCA) to capture non-linear interactions between passenger class, age, and embarkation point. Use batch normalization and dropout for regularization, and train with early stopping on a validation set to prevent overfitting.
